forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early becoming a steady light rain for the afternoon. High 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early becoming a steady light rain for the afternoon. High 42F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. Low around 5C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers overnight. Low 41F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 9C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 49F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low near 5C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low around 40F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 7C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 44F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds late. Low around 0C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 32F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 43F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low -2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 29F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 43F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. Low around 0C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. Low 33F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. High 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early with showers later at night. Low 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers. Low 37F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 44F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low near 35F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later in the day. High 42F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. Low 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Low 34F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy early with showers developing later in the day. High 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. High 42F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 33F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 43F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low near 35F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
